title: Violent Reign
description: OUT NOW!“You’ll do anything for love, won’t you? Too bad. There’s no love where you’re going.”Rome Montague has endured being shot, stabbed, and tortured. Now, he has to face his worst nightmare: the prospect of life without the woman he loves.Avery Capulet clutches a bouquet of flowers, her wedding dress fitted to cover the scars of her own horrific imprisonment. But she’s not marrying Rome Montague, the love of her life, the man she fought so hard to find her way back to. Instead, the man waiting for her at the altar is a monster. A man she least expected to be her villainous captor. A man she would have done anything for, once upon a time. A man with secrets so vast, it could threaten their very existence.But Avery has a secret of her own. A secret that could get her killed if she dares to reveal it.***VIOLENT REIGN is book three in the Violent Kingdom series from USA Today bestselling author Lili St. Germain about two warring families who are ruled by blood, power and twisted desire. This is the final novel in the story of Rome and Avery.
author: Lili St. Germain
